Very good game, shame it became free to play as this has resulted in more cheaters. Nevertheless though it is still a very enjoyable and competitive game.

Do not play this game if you value: 
1) Time
2) Fun
3) Short term gratification
4) A healthy sleep schedule
5) Anything resembling a meaningful existence
6) The outside (sun etc)
7) Interactions with well-meaning, intellectual human beings
8) Low Cortisol, blood pressure, stress levels
9) Time to prepare and eat a healthy diet
10) Yourself

Other than that its the best game ever, and I will probably put in 5000 more hours.
better than rainbow six for sure.

While CS:GO has its flaws at the core it is a great game! Unlike other E-Sports CS:GO requires a natural skill of sorts for reaction time and ability to have pinpoint accuracy. While overall these skills can be learned it creates a skill gap between players that can be noticed. This goes hand and hand with the strategy that also creates a divide as worse players refuse it use it and get picked off piece by piece. I have put hundreds of hours into CS on this account and others and even when I get mad at it I always come back.
good comp fps, but too old now and doesn't really change, good for free I guess since there's a non prime version now
